alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 5:26PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Custer and northwestern Fall River Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 526 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Edgemont, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood Springs Dam, Argyle, Hot Springs, Pringle, southwestern Wind Cave National Park and Cold Brook Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Fall River; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills
